meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or denoting the period before written records.
meanings.sent1: The cave paintings are a prehistoric form of art.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study prehistoric fossils to learn about ancient life.
meanings.sent3: The prehistoric tools made by early humans were quite primitive.
meanings.sent4: Her love for prehistoric stories was as old as time itself.
meanings.sent5: The prehistoric landscape was filled with mystery and wonder.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or existing in times before recorded history.
meanings.sent1: The prehistoric ruins tell stories of civilizations long gone.
meanings.sent2: Archaeologists uncover prehistoric artifacts buried deep underground.
meanings.sent3: The prehistoric fashion trends would not be popular today.
meanings.sent4: His prehistoric knowledge of technology was outdated.
meanings.sent5: The prehistoric era was a time of great discovery and innovation.
